organizations.name: Example Community Food Bank
organizations.description: A full-service food bank serving the Example County area with emergency food assistance, nutrition education, and community outreach programs.

organizations.name: Hope Kitchen Coalition
organizations.description: A grassroots organization providing free meals and food pantry services to families in need throughout Example City.

organizations.name: Example County Meals on Wheels
organizations.description: Delivering nutritious meals to homebound seniors and individuals with disabilities in Example County.
